level.heading: Violations; penalties.
level.text: ยง 26-612 Violations; penalties. It shall be illegal, for any person submitting an application for a rent increase exemption pursuant to this section, to make any false statement or willful misrepresentation of fact, and upon conviction thereof such applicant shall be guilty of a misdemeanor, punishable by a fine not to exceed five hundred dollars or imprisonment not to exceed ninety days, or both.
